scripts.dev: rm functions/views/includes/* && cp src/includes/* functions/views/includes && rm functions/views/layouts/* && cp src/layouts/* functions/views/layouts && rm -r public && parcel src/*.pug src/docs/*.pug src/styles/main.scss src/styles/cookie.scss src/js/cookie.js src/js/prevMail.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/global.js src/img/scmed/* src/img/NLogoHalignT.svg src/img/logoT.svg src/img/wlogoT.svg src/publicidad/* --out-dir public
scripts.build: rm functions/views/includes/* && cp src/includes/* functions/views/includes && rm functions/views/layouts/* && cp src/layouts/* functions/views/layouts && rm -r public && parcel build src/*.pug src/docs/*.pug src/styles/main.scss src/styles/cookie.scss src/js/cookie.js src/js/prevMail.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/global.js src/img/scmed/* src/img/NLogoHalignT.svg src/img/logoT.svg src/img/wlogoT.svg src/publicidad/* src/google2ff882864ba47fa1.html --out-dir public
